document.full_text: in an interview with u.s. law enforcement agents, the pakistani-born businessman charged with supporting the 2008 islamic militant attack on mumbai said his accused co-conspirator david headley was full of "loose talk."
document.title: defendant in mumbai attack trial spoke to fbi
lines_and_colors: in an interview with u.s. law enforcement agents, the pakistani-born businessman charged with supporting the 2008 islamic militant attack on mumbai said his accused co-conspirator david headley was full of "loose talk."
